title: Bob A thousand lives - Enhanced Edition
description: Bob's life is already over, but now he gets another chance at survival – though not every life is a new beginning. A brutal platformer where every death pushes Bob to face new challenges, and the line between failure and victory gets thinner with each attempt.
longDescription:

![Bob A thousand lives-1vx30](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/72dd01a89ebf422680cf3f228c9728fd/bob-a-thousand-lives-1vx30.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Bob: A thousand lives - Reviews
<!--text-->
[IGN] - "If you're looking for something special..."

[hvg.hu] - "This video game is the work of Hungarian developers, in which the past, present, and future exist simultaneously."

[PlayDome] - "Bob: A Thousand Lives takes you to a gloomy world."

[Leet.hu] - "Although the game has a captivating storyline, many will struggle with the platforming sections."

[Gamekapocs] - "Bob: A Thousand Lives, a Hungarian action-platformer released in the summer, will surely catch the attention of Playdead fans."

[GameStar] - "This Hungarian-developed platformer is both challenging and touching."

[PC Guru] - "The Hungarian-developed 2.5D action-platformer delves into dark themes, and as a challenge, it's a real nostalgia train."

TechKalauz - "The Hungarian developer created their game in 14 months, and it's already available for purchase."

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Bob A Thousand Lives - Enhanced Edition
<!--text-->
New Content:

Map Expansion: Explore exciting new areas that have been added to the game! Discover numerous new challenges and mysterious locations.
Memory Shard System: The new Memory Shard system allows you to review and revisit previous events, making it possible to gain insight and look back on past experiences. Additionally, collecting these shards adds an extra level of excitement to your adventures..
Game Enhancements:

Improved Graphics: Experience the game’s enhanced visuals with stunning details! Our visual upgrades bring every element to life and make the game even more immersive.
Increased Difficulty: Are you seeking a challenge? Well, from now on, the difficulty level of the enhanced edition will be suitable for you!
Enhanced Sound Effects: We have introduced brand new sound effects and musical pieces for a more immersive experience. Immerse yourself in the game’s atmosphere like never before!
Bug Fixes and Improvements:

Comprehensive bug fixes: We have listened to player feedback and addressed various issues and bugs in the enhanced edition, resulting in a smoother and more stable gameplay experience.
Enjoy the Enhanced Edition and have a great time playing!

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Bob: A thousand lives - Awards

[GDWC] – Bob: A thousand lives has reached 1st place in the GDWC 2023 January Top 10 ranking!


[IndieDB] - Indie of the Year 2022 – Players Choice – Seventh place


[GDWC] – Bob: A thousand lives has reached 1st place in the GDWC 2023 February Top 10 ranking!


[GDWC] – Bob: A Thousand Lives has reached 3rd place in the GDWC 2023 March Top 10 ranking!

<!--title-->
# PATCH NOTES
<!--text-->
SMALL UPDATE / PATCH NOTES

Current:
3.5.2 – 2023.04.06.

-Background effects
-General bug fixes.

MAJOR UPDATE / PATCH NOTES

3.5.1 2023.03.20.

New contents with new level
Adding to the story of the game
Graphics improvements
Performance optimization
General bug fixes
Character and movement animation improvements
SMALL UPDATE / PATCH NOTES

3.1.0

Expansion of visual effects
Camera reaction when shot
Interaction with the locations of fragments of the past
General bug fixes
MAJOR UPDATE / PATCH NOTES

We will continue to provide improvement updates in the future so you can enjoy BOB: A THOUSAND LIVES more comfortably.

3.0 – 2023.01.29.

A new LIGHT ability that allows orientation in darker places
Complete graphic transformation to achieve a more advanced effect.
Extended sound effects, visual effects.
New opponents have been added to the previous ones.
More lifelike movement animations.
Development of Bob’s character (in terms of animations, sounds)
Simplification of some critically difficult track sections
General bug fixes
SMALL UPDATE / PATCH NOTES

2.9.2 – 2022.11.26.

Another major graphics update
Improved movement and animation
Improved jumping and animation
Improved attack animation
SMALL UPDATE / PATCH NOTES

2.9.0 – 2022.11.24.

Another graphic update has been released for the game. We adapted the graphics to the theme of the game, with which we achieved a more melancholic effect, and also fixed some jumping errors.

SMALL UPDATE / PATCH NOTES

2.8.0

Motion animation update
Update character animations
General bug fixes
SMALL UPDATE / PATCH NOTES

2.7.0

Placing more traps
SMALL UPDATE / PATCH NOTES

2.6.0

Gameplay optimization
SMALL UPDATE / PATCH NOTES

2.5.0

Jump animation and sound updated
SMALL UPDATE / PATCH NOTES

2.4.0

Development of jump animation, improvement of sounds.
Graphical optimization.
General bug fixes.
SMALL UPDATE / PATCH NOTES

2.3.0

User interface development
SMALL UPDATE / PATCH NOTES

2.1.0

Improved navigation in the menus with a controller
MAJOR UPDATE / PATCH NOTES

2.0.0

Creation of a new Achievement system.
Track your game progress with statistics
Game statistics available from the main menu.
Game statistics available from the pause menu.
Main menu system optimization.
Enemy health system development.
Further optimization of hardware acceleration.
General bug fixes.
Text correction
SMALL UPDATE / PATCH NOTES

1.2.0

Optimization, Photosensitivity Warning
